summary: In the middle of a devastating Los Angeles earthquake, terrorists and bank robbers battle over a deadly super-virus.
cast: Wolf Larson|Erika Eleniak|Ron Perlman|Fred Dryer|Ray Laska|Morocco Omari|Matt Westmore|Brandon Karrer|Moe Irvin|Robert Arce|Deborah Shelton|Sam Scarber|Hugh Hodgin|Charmaine Cruz|Rachel Riley|Victoria Chalaya|Ezekel Cruz|Brian Katkin|Matthew Pollino|Jennifer Tetlow|Edwin Villa|Karla Zamudio
title: Shakedown
